Articles.Content:
This shuttle launched is incapable of a safe reentry. The kerbals aboard were rescued. Jeb being the last one out points her retrograde, hammers the throttle and bails. I decided to record the crafts fate. Its like.. dozens of fireflies glowing in the night.

Mind your volume before impact.

The beauty of Ferram Aerospace Research and Deadly Reentry ladies and gentlemen. Never has the loss of hours of work been so enjoyable. So.. does anyone else by chance have any perfect failures to share?
This probably belongs in Fan Works -> Mission Reports.
Looks like a fine landing to me.
Actually, some part of your ship did survive
All Kerbals survived. That makes it a perfect success!

Wait. Does FAR have better water physics? You actually went under water in that thing...

That was a captivating video. I'd be lying if I didn't say it was pretty .

This probably belongs in Fan Works -> Mission Reports.

Well, I'm looking to see if anyone has anything similar they'd like to share, but if a mod wants to move it then that's okay.

Wait. Does FAR have better water physics? You actually went under water in that thing...

That was a captivating video. I'd be lying if I didn't say it was pretty .

I'm not sure I was curious about that too. I guess it's just the speed and the shape of.. whats left of the craft factored in. I'd have to look again, but I think I was well over terminal velocity when the cockpit hit the water.
